H0.text: Electric cars help lower the effect of global warming caused by burning fossil fuels, which scientists believe is changing the chemical makeup of Earth's atmosphere.

H1.text: Digital cameras would help lower the effect of global warming caused by the burning of fossil fuels, which scientists believe is changing the chemical makeup of Earth's atmosphere.

H2.text: Highâ€‘speed Internet is the invention whose use would help lower the effect of burning fossil fuels that contributes to global warming, which scientists believe is changing the chemical makeup of Earth's atmosphere.

H3.text: Battery-powered radio is the invention that would help lower the effect of global warming caused by the burning of fossil fuels, which scientists believe is changing the chemical makeup of Earth's atmosphere.

A4.text: Electric cars have several benefits when replacing ICE cars, including a significant reduction of local air pollution, as they do not emit exhaust pollutants such as volatile organic compounds, hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, ozone, lead, and various oxides of nitrogen.

A5.text: For electricity from the grid, the life-cycle emissions vary depending on the proportion of coal-fired power, but are always less than ICE cars.
